startStory.story:
You awaken disheveled & alone. Cold damp air fills your lungs.
Where are you?
How did you get here?
Your eyes slowly adjust to the darkness & you realize you are at the entrance of the ancient Witch's Cavern.
 Bone chilling terror tingles down your spine as you hear her muffled call hanging in the air.
startStory.choiceA:
You are enticed.
The tales of power bestowed those survivers of the Witch's trial move you onward
 into the dark mouth of the cave.
startStory.choiceB:
You haven't gotten this far in life by falling for such treacherous evil as this!
 Try & find a path home.

aStory.story:
Your stiff limbs propel you forward, as if possessed.
The cave is pitch black as you walk down what seems to be a long corridor.
Time passes, but it feels meaningless.
It could have been minutes or hours.
Eventually you see a dim light that's coming from a large yawning hollow.
Before you is a crooked house, reaching to ceiling of the giant cavern.
You can see the lights are on, someone is home.
aStory.choiceA:
You have come this far.
Glory is only earned by those who seek it!
Meet the Witch & realize your destiny.
aStory.choiceB:
You know a trap when you see one.
You are no fool!
Head down the tunnel on your right.
You can feel fresh air oozing from the entrance.

bStory.story:
You find your way through the lush forest along an old path.
As you go along you start to notice how quiet it is.
Deathly quiet.
Yet still, you trudge on.
The silence is deafening & drains your energy.
You stumble & fall.
As you lay there, drooling into the dirt, you hear something... someone is crying.
You stand up, attempting to get your wits about you.
bStory.choiceA:
You trudge forwards, you picture a fragile fair maiden who needs saving!
You move sluggishly towards the sound.
You will be a hero & shall be rewarded with gold & treasures.
 You will be the champion bards write of of centuries!
bStory.choiceB:
The noise seems stark & frightening against the quiet.
In your dreamy haze you see a small home unlike any dwelling you have seen before.
Perhaps there you can find help for what ales you.

cStory.story:
You knock thrice upon the weathered Witch's door, & it creaks open loudly.
Her voice is filling your ears, warm & smooth like honey.
She pulls you into a small intimate room, feeling her presence behind you.
Her boney fingers clutching your shoulders harshly.
'Come to find your fortune? Look deeply into the eyes of Raydom the conqueror, who met his end here some 200 years ago in this very room!'
Your attention is drawn to skull on the table surrounded by dripping candles.
You gaze into the empty sockets where the storied hero's blue eyes used to have been.
Your bravery in the face of such ghoulish conditions is seen by Raydom.
He has weighed your soul & you are the chosen one to carry on his quest.
There is a shrill scream & your surroundings swirl away. You are now the proud owner of the renowned Vorpal Blade of Edenith, entitling you to rule the Eight Kingdoms of Halyth!

dStory.story:
The smell of sweet fresh air feels like a restorative tonic.
You gulp it down & head away from the Witch's entanglement.
You walk into what seems to be a light green whimsical garden.
In front of you is a large tree, teeming with life & the sweet songs of birds.
Your mouth is so parched.
You see the glistening clear water of a pond beneath its branches.
In the shallows there is a glistening golden goblet.
You reach into they pool & pull it up filled with delicious crisp crystal water.
It tastes foul in your mouth!
Your cowardice has led you astray.
The room was a mirage. A trap laid by the Witch herself!
You have been poisoned!

eStory.story:
Your limbs are heavy, as if filled with sand.
You fall & hit hard against the base of a tree.
To you horror, you realize you are face to face with a large skull reeking of noxious dark magic.
You have fallen into a Witch's trap!
You're surrounded by her deadly trinkets, & doomed to wait for her to come check her ensnarement.

fStory.story:
You approach the house & find that is an enormous toadstool,
with a chimney puffing merry smoke.
The aromas of neillaflowers in the spring, & tangy rosemary fills your nose.
You regain you composure, the spell lifted.
A kind Gnibbling couple greets you at the home's door, & fills you up a long flagon of steaming mulder spice broth.
They tell you of their missing child, & after your rest you vow to bring young Gnibblet home.
You found your calling!
